text: Znayte zhe, chto zhizn' mira sego - lish' igra i zabava, bakhval'stvo i pokhval'ba mezhdu vami, sostyazaniye v tom, chtoby obresti bol'she imushchestva i detey, - [vse eto] podobno dozhdyu, predveshchayushchemu dobryy urozhay i privodyashchemu v vostorg zemledel'tsev, tak kak on sposobstvuyet rostu [rasteniy]. No potom [rasteniya] uvyadayut, i ty vidish', kak oni zhelteyut i obrashchayutsya v trukhu. A v budushchey zhizni [nevernym] ugotovano tyazhkoye nakazaniye, [veruyushchim] zhe - i proshcheniye ot Allakha, i blagovoleniye. Ved' zhizn' v etom mire - lish' obol'shcheniye blagami prekhodyashchimi
